CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 18, 1953, pg. 7 reads: "Bishop's Wife Honored At Luncheon - Mrs. Nannie J. Bonner, wife of Bishop I.H. Bonner, of the Ninth Episcopal District and her sister, Mrs. Carrie Russell, of Henderson, N.C., were special guests at a beautiful luncheon on Saturday in the Nesbit's Private Dining Room. Mrs. Alma A. Polk was hostess.  Guest game prizes were won by Mrs. Bonner and Mrs. Willa Mae Rice.  Mrs. Bonner and Mrs. Russell, both received guest gifts. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of women, including Alma Illery, and Willa Mae Rice, standing in background, gathered at long banquet table in Nesbit's private dining room for luncheon honoring Nannie J. Bonner
